title: Project Kickoff - Exciting Start!
content: Started working on a new monorepo setup. Decided to use Turborepo for build optimization and module sharing. Feeling pumped!

title: Choosing the Backend Framework
content: After exploring several options, I decided to use Hono.js for the API layer. Lightweight, fast, and aligns with my philosophy of simplicity.

title: Database Dilemmas
content: Turso seemed like a great choice, but its GDPR compliance is a concern. Looking into alternatives that provide better isolation.

title: Dynamic Routing with Hono
content: Implemented an automatic route registration system based on file structure. Now, I can just drop a handler file, and it gets mapped automatically!

title: ShadCN + Tailwind Setup
content: Styled the app using ShadCN components and TailwindCSS. The UI now looks clean, and customization feels effortless.

title: TypeScript Strict Mode Woes
content: Enabled strict mode in TypeScript. Now drowning in errors, but future-me will thank me for this.

title: Authentication with Auth0
content: Integrated Auth0 for authentication. Smooth experience, but dealing with session management on a multi-zone Next.js setup is tricky.

title: Micro-SaaS MVP is Taking Shape
content: Implemented basic CRUD operations for user profiles and subscriptions. Next step: integrating background jobs with Trigger.dev.

title: Fine-Tuning AI Image Generation
content: Experimenting with Stable Diffusion XL fine-tuning. Trying to make AI-generated profile pictures look more professional.

title: DynamoDB Schema Rework
content: Flattened the nextContactAt field to optimize querying. Feels cleaner and should improve performance.

title: Implementing API Rate Limiting
content: Added rate limiting to prevent abuse using Hono middleware. Next step: better analytics on API usage.

title: Dealing with Webhooks in a Multi-Tenant App
content: Handling webhooks for multiple tenants is proving to be a challenge. Considering a queue-based approach.

title: Frontend Microfrontend Architecture
content: Finalized the microfrontend structure. Each app (documents, dashboard, etc.) now loads independently in Next.js zones.

title: Benchmarking Database Performance
content: Ran performance tests on different databases. DynamoDB is fast, but indexing strategies matter a lot.

title: Turborepo Build Optimization
content: Made some tweaks to the Turborepo caching strategy. Build times are now significantly faster!

title: Auto-Generating OpenAPI Docs
content: Implemented automatic OpenAPI documentation from Hono handlers. No more manual API documentation updates!

title: Trigger.dev Job Scheduling
content: Set up scheduled background jobs using Trigger.dev. Now I can automate recurring tasks easily.

title: EKS Troubleshooting Again
content: Another day, another Kubernetes mystery. Debugging networking issues in an EKS cluster is never fun.

title: Improving Developer Experience
content: Added a CLI tool to automate common dev tasks. The team loves it!

title: Writing SDKs for External Developers
content: Started working on an SDK to expose our APIs cleanly for external developers. Keeping DX in mind!

title: Dockerizing Everything
content: Made sure every service has a proper Docker setup. Now, onboarding new developers is much smoother.

title: Fixing Edge Case Bugs
content: Spent the day fixing edge cases I never thought would happen. Users always find the weirdest bugs!

title: Preparing for Production Deployment
content: Final security audits and performance optimizations before the big launch. Exciting times ahead!

title: Go-Live Day!
content: The app is live! Seeing real users sign up is surreal. Time to monitor and iterate!
